snippet: UniCredit is the latest European lender to announce a major reorganization as banks face slow growth and strict regulatory requirements.
abstract: DealBook Online; UniCredit announces it will get rid of 18,200 jobs and ramp up cost-cutting measures over three years to avoid necessity of capital increase.
lead_paragraph: UniCredit is the latest European lender to announce a major reorganization as banks face slow growth and strict regulatory requirements.

headline.main: Unicredit of Italy to Cut 18,200 Jobs as Part of Overhaul
